 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּרַד‎</span>] **verb** ==scrape, scratch== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גְּרַד‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhJwAcAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAnABwAAAJchI+py+0PYQiHxpumtrhv3nlTSGpkeaaqM67R5j4faMbAjNQGGOJ53jrBMkBdL7gzUXyizMzClPBuz9ZTwhh+klvWlFqsXRdGWTcKPGqHNur666rCbd22/Y5nFAAAOw=="> &amp; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מגרדם‎</span> ***flesh-scrapers*** [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>338. 4</sup>; compare also Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***peel*** or ***strip off*** bark, ***shave*** hair from a hide etc.) — 

**Hithpa\`el** ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְהִתְגָּרֵד‎</span> ***scrape one's self*** [[Job.2.8|Job 2:8]].
